titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Frank Deutscher Company records 1978.143
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-08-21 11:11:12 +0000.

did.abstract: This collection consists of the records of the Frank Deutscher Company, a real estate firm located at 16 Court Street in Brooklyn. The records include documents for individual land transfers and appraisals of land owned by the Edison Electric Illuminating Company in 1906. It also includes real estate records relating to other properties in Brooklyn, including deeds, mortgages, and architectural plans, spanning the period 1905 to 1962.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Frank Deutscher Company records, 1978.143, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.
